tools.label: AmazonProductReviews
tools.description: Worker that retrieves Amazon product reviews. If you don't have the product asin code, you should call amazon_product_search to get the product asin.

tools.label: AmazonProductSearch
tools.description: Worker that searches for Amazon products.
